line.text: But do thy worst to steal thy self away
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For term of life thou art assured mine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And life no longer than thy love will stay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For it depends upon that love of thine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then need I not to fear the worst of wrongs
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When in the least of them my life hath end
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I see a better state to me belongs
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Than that which on thy humour doth depend
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou canst not vex me with inconstant mind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Since that my life on thy revolt doth lie
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O what a happy title do I find
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Happy to have thy love happy to die
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But what so blessed-fair that fears no blot
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou mayst be false and yet I know it not
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
